result.execSummary:
All charges against Fidel Nmi Mendoza Villareal in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Fidel Nmi Mendoza Villareal is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Fidel Nmi Mendoza Villareal

records.addlTxt:
10:01 AM Prosecuting attorney Daniel Joseph Tombasco in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Fidel Nmi Mendoza Villareal in court, in custody.  Attorney Chad A Shamali in court for Fidel Nmi Mendoza Villareal. Spanish interpreter, Leo Martin, appeared in court. Clerk N. Nobile.
MINUTES: Spanish interpreter, Leo Martin sworn in. For reasons set forth on the record the State moves to dismiss this case without prejudice. Court dismisses case without prejudice.
Email from ADA Tombasco - State will be moving to dismiss this case w/o prejudice; re-issue the proper felony charge

State appeared by Attorney Drew Lehman. Attorney Chad A Shamali in court with Defendant Fidel Nmi Mendoza Villareal who appears in custody.  Interpreter Leo Martin in court.  Clerk: PU
  Minutes:   Atty Shamali states DE's actual legal name is Juan Rios.  Parties may file an amendment if name is deemed incorrect.  Sworn in and testified is State's witness: KPD Officer Hoffman;  cross-examination by Atty Shamali.  ST rests and Atty Shamali moves to dismiss Count 2.  Court does not find probable cause on Count 2 and Count 2 is dismissed.  Probable cause is found on Count 1 at the misdemeanor level.  Bond continued.  Judicial Pretrial - in court scheduled for September 22, 2022 at 09:30 am.

0156 PM    Assistant District Attorney Brenda Valdes appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Chad Shamali.   Clerk JT  Minutes: Intepreter Leo Martin.   Defendant requests preliminary hearing within 10 days; set before Commissioner on  8-11-22 @845am. Bond Continued. ec

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: from the court re: Judicial Rotation on 8/1/22 mailed to the DE

01:14 PM    Assistant District Attorney Brenda Valdes appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in custody. Spanish Interpreter Ruth Garcia.   Clerk JT  Minutes: Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 1, 2022 at 01:00 pm. bond continued as previously set (see previous bond entry). SPD has not appointed counsel for DE. Court tolls time for the preliminary hearing. rb

Defendant Fidel Nmi Mendoza Villareal in court, in custody with spanish interpreter Hilda Shymanik.  Attorney Alexander Huber appeared for the Prosecution.   Clerk JT  Minutes:  SPD has been unable to appoint an attorney for DE for today's hearing. Court holds colloquy with DE re: proceeding pro se or waiving time to allow SPD to appoint an attorney.  DE waives time for preliminary hearing. Court reschedules preliminary hearing to an attorney status hearing.  Bond continued.  Status conference scheduled for June 15, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
SPD has not yet secured representation.  kmk

PROPER ATTIRE REQUIRED.  NO SHORTS OR TANK TOPS ALLOWED IN COURTROOM.
  No contact including the residence, electronic or 3rd party with: Crossroads Care Center 8633 32nd Ave.

02:06 PM    State appears by Attorney Alexandra Smathers.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Christopher Bub.  Spanish interpreter, Leo Martin, appeared in court.  Defendant requests preliminary hearing within 10 days; set before Commissioner on May 6, 2022 at 08:30 am.  $1000  Cash Bond Set w/conditions (see bond entry).  DE identified himself to Atty as Jose Luis Galaviz-Santana aka entered into case.  ts
and witness list filed by the State
